tasks.task: Harvest bok choy from tower garden
subtasks: Reach into the tower garden to grasp the bok choy
Gently pull the bok choy out of the tower garden
Inspect the roots of the bok choy for health
Gather ingredients for the stir fry
Chop the bok choy into appropriate sizes for stir fry
Add ingredients to the pan in the order typical for a stir fry
Stir and cook the ingredients until properly prepared
